defaultOpen.description: The open state of the submenu when it is initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its open state.
defaultOpen.description_zh: 子菜单最初呈现时的打开状态。在不需要控制其打开状态时使用。

:open.description: The controlled open state of the menu. Can be used as `v-model:open`.
:open.description_zh: 菜单的受控打开状态。可以用作 `v-model:open`。

events.name: update:open
events.description: Event handler called when the open state of the submenu changes.
events.description_zh: 当子菜单的打开状态更改时调用的事件处理程序。
